description: HeyGen is an innovative video platform that harnesses the power of generative AI to streamline your video creation process. Unleash your creativity with HeyGen - the future of video production.
title: HeyGen - AI Video Generator
introduction: HeyGen is an AI-powered video creation platform that allows users to effortlessly produce studio-quality videos with AI-generated avatars and voices. It offers a range of features for creating engaging and entertaining videos for various purposes, including sales outreach, content marketing, product marketing, and learning & development.
features: Create or choose an avatar from over 100+ AI avatars
Record or choose a voice from a collection of high-quality voices
Start with a template or from scratch
Select from a variety of avatars spanning different ethnicities, ages, and styles
Video translation with one-click solution for seamless delivery in other languages
API integration for programmatically creating avatar videos
ChatGPT script writer for accelerating video creation
AI outfits for customizable clothing options

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can get started for free on the HeyGen platform.

faqs.question: Who is the target user of HeyGen?
faqs.answer: HeyGen is suitable for professionals and beginners who want to create stunning videos in minutes instead of hours.
